headlines.description: Manchester City returned to the top as two goals from Gabriel Jesus and another by substitute Raheem Sterling secured a 3-1 win over Everton.
headlines.shortLinkText: City back on top after home win over Everton

video.headline: Man City 3-1 Everton: Jesus sends City back to top

tracking.trackingName: Man City 3 - 1 Everton: Jesus at the double as City sink Everton

headlines.description: Crystal Palace moved five points clear of the bottom three in the Premier League when Luka Milivojevic scored to give the south London club a 1-0 wi
headlines.shortLinkText: Milivojevic stunner gives Palace three points

headlines.description: Newcastle United moved clear of the Premier League's relegation zone after a second-half goal from Salomon Rondon brought a 1-0 win at Huddersfield.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rondon gives Newcastle victory at Huddersfield

headlines.description: Tottenham Hotspur substitute Christian Eriksen scored in added time as they snatched a 1-0 win over Burnley at Wembley Stadium.
headlines.shortLinkText: Eriksen strike gives Spurs last-gasp Burnley win

headlines.description: Watford held on to repel a late comeback and beat Cardiff City 3-2 in the Premier League at Vicarage Road on Saturday.

video.headline: Watford 3-2 Cardiff: Thriller at Vicarage Road

tracking.trackingName: Watford 3-2 Cardiff: Thriller at Vicarage Road

headlines.shortLinkText: Watford withstand Cardiff comeback to win

headlines.description: Wolverhampton Wanderers continued their surge in form by beating Bournemouth 2-0 with goals from Raul Jimenez and Ivan Cavaleiro at Molineux.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jimenez on target as Wolves beat Bournemouth

headlines.description: West Ham added to Fulham's Premier League woes on Saturday at Craven Cottage, beating their London rivals 2-0.
headlines.shortLinkText: West Ham deepen struggling Fulham's problems

video.headline: Fulham 0-2 West Ham: Hammers continue winning ways

tracking.trackingName: Fulham 0-2 West Ham: Hammers continue winning ways
